customers.email: Customer's login email address - unique identifier used for authentication and communications
customers.first_name: Customer's legal first name as entered during registration
customers.last_name: Customer's legal last name as entered during registration
customers.signup_date: Date when the customer created their account (YYYY-MM-DD format)
customers.country: Customer's country of residence - used for shipping and tax calculations
customers.lifetime_value: Total revenue generated by this customer across all orders in USD - updated after each completed order
products.product_name: Full product name as displayed in the catalog and on invoices
products.category: Product category for organization: 'Electronics' (computers, peripherals), 'Accessories' (cables, adapters), or 'Furniture' (office furniture)
products.price: Current retail price in USD - may differ from historical purchase prices in order_items
products.stock_quantity: Current number of units available in warehouse - updated in real-time with sales and restocks
orders.order_date: Timestamp when the order was placed by customer (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)
orders.status: Current order state: 'pending' (payment processing/order prep), 'shipped' (in transit to customer), 'delivered' (successfully received), 'cancelled' (refunded/voided)
orders.total_amount: Total order value in USD including all items - used for revenue reporting
order_items.quantity: Number of units of this product ordered
order_items.price_per_unit: Price of the product at time of purchase in USD - may differ from current product.price due to sales or price changes
